name: AltarClock
description:
This is a multiplayer card game for two players.

The Sun and the Moon fights to become Chronos' protégé.

Keep in your mind:

When the Moon wins the nights are longer when the Sun wins the days are longer.
This is their path it does not prove they are better or worse than the other.
